birinci portal oyununu oynamadan oynadığım için başlarda ne olduüunu çok anlamadım ama oyun gittikçe hikayesi enteresanlaşıyor. Bulmacaları da ayrı bir dert zaten bazen 2 saat bulamadığım şey dibimde çıkıyor kanser oluyorum o benim salaklığım siz onu boşverin ama tam bir vakit öldürmelik oyun diyelim arkadaşlarınızı bekliyorsunuz ama yapacak birşey yok girin bu oyuna istediğiniz kadar takılın. Güzel bir oyun öneririm
Fena bir hikayesı yok ama çok güzel bir finali var. Güzel düşünülmüş orijinal bir oyun.
Portal 2 to zdecydowanie najlepsza gra od Valve i jedna z najlepszych w jakie grałem wszystkim ją mega polecam . nie bujcie się zagadek logicznych nie są aż tak trudne jak może się wydawać .
To jest naprawde dobra gra. Polecam osobom lubiącym gry logiczne. Chciałbym, żeby valve zrobiło trzecią część.

Прохождение сюжетки (соло) очень мне понравился, сам сюжет и головоломки просто хороши, c другом так и не прошел, поскольку застряли на одном из последних уровней (очень сложно). Игра отличная хоть и очень старая, стер бы память и прошел бы снова как сюжетку так и прохождение с другом.

Wonderful game! Much better graphics than the original. The System Requirements are overrated because I have a 2.3GHz CPU and 4GBs of memory and it works great! Unlike the original, Portal 2 has a co-op mode, where you can play online with your friends, or splitscreen. Or find a random person on Portal 2 also looking for a game. There's also a level editor which is pretty cool, includes all (and even more) of the items in the actual game, and there's also controller support which works great for me. In summary, it's a great game and I think it's totally worth the money!
One of the best puzzle games of all time.

Where do I start with this game. This game used to be my most favorite game (until dbd and tf2 came), simply due to its amazing campaign. One of the best stories ever, and easy to understand mechanics. And that's only a fourth of the game! another is it's amazing co-op mode. A just as good campaign to be played with a friend with all new maps to be friendly to two players. And not to mention this game is funny as hell. another great fact about this game is it's community maps. Anyone, yes even you, can make an amazing map for anyone to play, giving this game awesome replay ability, and you can make custom maps for co-op, so you and your buddy can play all day long!

This sequel to the classic Portal delivers more comedy, more story, and more importantly more testing.
Featuring a classic singleplayer story, a separate co-op campaign, and compatibility with the Steam workshop Portal 2 is a lovable sequel done right.
